sci.crayfis.shramp.util

Class StorageMedia

  • java.lang.Object
    • sci.crayfis.shramp.util.StorageMedia

  • public abstract class StorageMedia
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls all disk actions on the ShRAMP data directory

    • Method Detail

      • cleanDir

        public static void cleanDir(@Nullable
                            java.lang.String name)
        Clean a directory of all it's files and subfolders, but does not delete the directory itself.
        Parameters:
        name - If null, clears everything under ShRAMP/, if not an absolute path assumes its relative to ShRAMP/.

      • cleanSlate

        public static void cleanSlate()
        Wipes out all files and directories under ShRAMP/, but does not delete ShRAMP/

      • createDirectory

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String createDirectory(@Nullable
                                                          java.lang.String name)
        Creates a sub-directory for depositing data (could be a hierarchy, e.g. parent/parent/dir)
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the sub-directory, usually meant to be a timestamp in string form, the ShRAMP home directory is implied if not part of the name, i.e. this name is then understood as home/name. If name is null, creates home directory.
        Returns:
        The full path of the new directory as a string, null if unsuccessful

      • getBacklog

        public static int getBacklog()

      • isBusy

        public static boolean isBusy()

      • newCalibration

        public static void newCalibration(@Nullable
                                  java.lang.String name)
        Create a new directory under ShRAMP/Calibrations/ and sets WorkingDirectory to this.
        Parameters:
        name - If null, makes a new directory with the current date Datestamp. If not an absolute path, assumes its relative to ShRAMP/Calibrations/. If directory already exists, takes no action besides setting WorkingDirectory to this.

      • newInProgress

        public static void newInProgress(@Nullable
                                 java.lang.String name)
        Create a new directory under ShRAMP/InProgress/ and sets WorkingDirectory to this.
        Parameters:
        name - If null, makes a new directory with the current date Datestamp. If not an absolute path, assumes its relative to ShRAMP/InProgress/. If directory already exists, takes no action besides setting WorkingDirectory to this.

      • removeDir

        public static void removeDir(@Nullable
                             java.lang.String name)
        Remove a directory and all of it's files and subfolders.
        Parameters:
        name - If null, removes everything under ShRAMP/ including ShRAMP/ itself. If not an absolute path, assumes its relative to ShRAMP/

      • removeEmptyDirs

        public static void removeEmptyDirs(@Nullable
                                   java.lang.String startDirectory)
        Wipes out any empty directories under startDirectory
        Parameters:
        startDirectory - empty directories under this, if null, startDirectory = ShRAMP/

      • setUpShrampDirectory

        public static void setUpShrampDirectory()
        Check if ShRAMP data directory exists, if not initialize it

        public static void writeCalibration(@NonNull
                                    OutputWrapper wrapper)

        public static void writeWorkingDirectory(@NonNull
                                         OutputWrapper wrapper,
                                         @Nullable
                                         java.lang.String subpath)
